page.title: 08Employment in Dedham
page.content: Because there are more shops than usual in a typical village of less than 2000 inhabitants there are more local jobs. The catering industry:- hotels, inns and high class restauraunts also offers more employment. Many people with large houses employ part-time domestic assistance.However in our sample of 40 typical families with 69 people in regular work only 20 are employed in Dedham.11 are employed in Colchester and a further 11 commute to London,60 miles away,6 offered services such as building and decorating in the local area. The school employs 17 people either full or part-time. Other jobs are associated with the Post Office,garages and agriculture.
